vote.title: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 24-1641, previously approved on November 13, 2024, authorizing an Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (Agreement No. CSJ 0918-47-376, Assistance Listing No. 20.205) for cost to implement bike lanes along Fair Oaks Avenue from Ridgecrest Road to Walnut Hill Lane, for the purpose of revising the project budget to increase state participation from $20,528.00 to $22,681.00, increasing the total project budget from $466,778.00 to $468,931.00 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: Authorize an amendment to Resolution No. 24-1641, previously approved on November 13, 2024, authorizing an Advance Funding Agreement with the Texas Department of Transportation (Agreement No. CSJ 0918-47-376, Assistance Listing No. 20.205) for cost to implement bike lanes along Fair Oaks Avenue from Ridgecrest Road to Walnut Hill Lane, for the purpose of revising the project budget to increase state participation from $20,528.00 to $22,681.00, increasing the total project budget from $466,778.00 to $468,931.00 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
